subject: Re: From United Nation Federal Rep
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am delighted to hear that my ATM card has been registered with DHL Express. However, I would like to clarify a few details before proceeding further.

Could you please provide me with the tracking number for the shipment? This will allow me to monitor the progress of the delivery and ensure that it arrives safely at my address.

Additionally, could you please confirm the exact amount of the security keeping fee? I want to make sure that I have sufficient funds available to cover this cost.

Here are my details:

Full Name: John Doe
Telephone No: +1-234-567-890
Receiving Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Country: United States

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Don
